t: Sales collapse forces 'woke' mega-brand to make humiliating U-turn and relist on Amazon | Daily Mail Online
s: 1 week ago - America's most popular shoe is coming back to Amazon. After a five-year hiatus, Nike shoes, clothing, and accessories are returning to the e-commerce giant. The athletic brand swiped its products from the platform in 2019, as part of a push to sell more directly to consumers.
